answerOptions.answerText: 게임을 바로 끝내는 것이 아니라, 끝나기 전 몇 번의 기회를 더 가지기 위해서

quiz.questionText: When is a good time to restart a game

answerOptions.answerText: when a player wins or loses

quiz.questionText: When should a game end

answerOptions.answerText: when an enemy ship is destroyed
when a hero ship is destroyed

quiz.questionText: A good way to add a level to your game is:

answerOptions.answerText: Increment the amount of points necessary to complete a given level
Add more players to the game
Add more graphics to the game

quizzes.title: Lesson 20 - 스페이스 게임 - 끝과 재시작: 강의 후 퀴즈

quiz.questionText: What is a good pattern to use when a game end condition has been met?

answerOptions.answerText: Display a suitable message, offer the player to restart, and display what key to hit for that action

because it can be used as vector of attack to execute malicious scripts.

quiz.questionText: What is an immutable object?

answerOptions.answerText: An object defined as a constant
An object that cannot be modified after it's created
A copy of an existing object

quiz.questionText: What benefit(s) do you get from using state management?

answerOptions.answerText: You can keep track of every place the state is updated
It's easier to debug the code

quiz.questionText: What's the best way to persist critical user data across different sessions?

answerOptions.answerText: In a database behind a server API

quizzes.title: Lesson 24 - 은행 프로젝트 - 상태 관리의 컨셉: 강의 후 퀴즈

quiz.questionText: What do you think state management means?

answerOptions.answerText: Logging the user interface state over time
Keeping your app data flows clean and synchronizing the user interface with data

quiz.questionText: How can you keep track of the user session state?
Mutating an object is always the best way to update it
